questions: Q. 1. What is the full form of HDI?  1 mark each
Q. 2. Why do some people oppose dams ? Give one reason.
answers: Ans. Because this disrupt the lives of people who are displaced.

questions: Q. 3. What other goal is included in the developmental goals besides having better income ?
answers: Ans. Equal treatment, freedom, education, security and peace.

questions: Q. 4. What is denoted by the life expectancy at birth ?
answers: Ans. Average expected length of life.

questions: Q. 5. Why Kerala has low infant mortality rate ?
answers: Ans. It has adequate provision of basic health and educational facilities.

questions: Q. 6. How can we achieve the development goals of different sections of our society ?
Q. 7. Which state of India has a high infant mortality rate according to data 2003 ?
Q. 8. What is India’s HDI rank in the world?
Q. 9. Which is a development goal for the landless rural labourers ?
answers: Ans. More days of work and better wages.

questions: Q. 10. What do you mean by ‘Literacy Rate’ ?
answers: Ans. It measures the proportion of literate population in the 7 years and above age group.

questions: Q. 11. In which state, literacy rate is the highest ?
Q. 12. How we will calculate Body Mass Index ?
answers: Ans. Dividing the weight by the square of the height in meters.

questions: Q. 13. Which country has the largest size of illiterate population in the age group of 15 + in the world ?
Q. 14. Write the components of Human Development Index ?
answers: Ans. Life expectancy, gross enrolment ratio and per capita income.
